user.title: Connect to Contact Energy
user.description: Configure your Contact Energy account to download usage data for the Energy Dashboard. The integration will poll for new data every 8 hours.

data_description.email: Your Contact Energy account email address
data_description.usage_months: Number of months of historical usage data to download (up to 3 years). More months = longer initial setup time.
